Yikes. It is fun and I do recommend it but I would never say it's a good game.
Muy bueno el juego, falta optimizacion el los servers y mejor equipo de balanceo pero fuera de eso comprarlo valio la pena
Super fun, hours played in just days
Extremamente bugado, matchmaking porco e desbalanceado e servidores bugados.
“we did petty good job so far” what a joke. In fact,I like it :P

This game is very fun, especially when you are with friends. The game overall isn't that scary but that doesn't take anything away from the enjoyment of the game especially with how exciting the chases against the killer can be. The only downsides are how much is locked behind purchasing DLC such as skins or new survivors/killers, and sometimes the wait times can be long but is only really noticeable when it is late at night but this doesn't take away too much from the game either. Overall a very good buy!
the only game u love and hate equally

the ineptitude of the devs to listen to those who play their game and address glaring issues in gameplay/bugs etc. has lead to the player base dwindling away. perks that are comically OP take FAR too long to nerf, if theyre fixed at all. steer clear of this game, the golden age is over and it now slowly dying off. dbd will be a case study in how NOT to further develop you game  and interact and listen to the community.

DO NOT BUY!
Great game get to kill your friends or help them survive your choice but all and all great fun
I mostly enjoy getting everyone off the hook.
Honestly Some Of The Most Fun I've Ever Had Pretty Great Community Lovely Experience :)

Always fun to jump into a game. Depending on the day you might want to play killer or survivor. You also feel like there is always room for improvement. I have played for 29h and I feel like I have only scratched the surface of the game. Only problem I have so far is the ranking system. The system is set in a way where it is easy to rank up and hard to rank down.

Holy sh*tballs is it intense, it will have your heart thumping. Very rewarding when you get out as a survivor, there's lots of unlockables to bring the replayability factor to the game. Great with friends, involves lots of teamwork but I don't know how good it would be without a group, so maybe worth getting a couple of buddies to join you/find a team.

Dead by Daylight is one of those games that you pull out with a group of friends at 12:36 a.m. on a Saturday because it's the weekend and you'll be darned if you pass up an opportunity to have a few laughs and spooks before falling asleep at your desk, then waking up at 11:24 a.m. wondering how you actually managed to get yourself from your desk into your bed.

Played my first game as killer in a long time. Took 10 minutes just to find a match. When I eventually did, I hooked two survivors with 0 completed Gens. This game was going great... Until I glitched into a gen I just kicked. Literally got stuck and could not escape no matter what I tried. I had no choice but to leave the match. At which point I got banned from match making for 5 minutes. 

This game is how old now?" They are too busy including micro transactions instead of fixing simple game breaking bugs such as that. Not a good first impression when returning back to the game.
Tirando umas desconexões aqui  e alí, o jogo é muito divertido. Faz muito tempo desde que ficava horas em um jogo e este aqui atingiu este patamar com maestria.

Game is nice but can you finnaly fix wraith as a killer? he can be invisible for 90% of the game revile himself in 2s and hit just after plus he is super fast when running. can you fix him to be more normal killer to play against? This makes alsost 90% of solo Q instant loose when he is on 4 perks.

Good game, you genuinely feel like you're in a horror movie, and it's satisfying to both be survivor and killer. However, it has some shitty monetization practices and it has some general issues (I crashed within 90 minutes of booting up the game). Not to mention, some of the best perks in the game are locked behind a paywall. I do intend to play this game more, but I can't in good faith recommend a game that sells itself in pieces.
Muito divertido pra jogar com os amigos, quem estiver afim de jogar junto ai me adiciona e manda mensagem.
Fuck this game fuck everything about it I hate it so much but I still play it it's addicting af

So, I'm not going to just tear this game apart for no reason I want to actually give valid critique. Firstly, I fully believe that Behaviour could not care less about the players that are ranked higher than rank 15. It truly feels like they don't even remotely listen to the higher ranked player base. Every change that comes to the game caters to those that are either brand new or just not that talented at it. With that being said, I mean no disrespect to newer players but changes should not revolve solely around players that really don't know that much.

Of course, not every change that Behaviour has introduced has been bad at all, I think they have some incredible DLC options and that the licenses that they have access too are remarkable. I think that Flashbang is the most interesting and fun to use perk that has been introduced into the game in years. Sadly, I can't really say that about many other perks. The last few chapters have all introduced perks that feel utterly useless and puts you at a severe disadvantage to use them unless you're at a lower rank, and by that I mean lower rank killers cannot punish you for not playing meta.

Playing in red ranks on both survivor and killer is actually terrible. I say this for a few reasons, the first being that you have absolutely zero incentive to rank up; which is not a new complaint by any stretch of the imagination. Ask any high rank DBD player about it and they will agree that all higher rank gets you is sweaty killers/survivors, meta perk builds, and the same 4 killers every single match. It is exhausting. Just to add to that, if you try to use any perks that aren't meta, like Flashbang for example, you are completely screwed. Decisive Strike, Iron Will, Unbreakable, and Dead Hard. That is practically all you can run as a survivor without being destroyed.

Game balance. The balance in this game is so ungodly broken for a multitude of reasons. Firstly, matchmaking has not worked for a good year. Like I said earlier, I am a red rank survivor and killer however I am 100% a survivor main. With that being said a killer against a full red rank survivor team will get destroyed; no question. However, that rarely happens. I just finished playing 4 survivor games and not in a single one did I have survivors that were ranked anywhere near me. I had plenty of rank 15-20 survivor teammates against rank 1 killers which is just no fun for anyone.

I wish I could recommend this game, but I really just can't. The first maybe 30 hours or so you put into this game will be incredible. I have no doubt in my mind. Back when I first got this game, it was the absolute best horror multiplayer experience I have ever had. But the more and more you learn how the game works, and the higher your rank climbs (which will always happen, rank does not equate to skill, rank is purely a measurement of how much time you have played during that rank reset. If you play enough during a reset you will 100% hit rank 1), you will notice how bad the game is at its core both balance wise and design wise. 

It is unfortunate because this is hands down the best 4v1 horror game on the market and it will continue to be for some time, I don't see any new game every toppling Dead by Daylight. But even with this being the best option out there, I still don't think this game has even remotely reached the potential that it could climb to.

As much as I hate a lot of things about this game, I am completely addicted and will continue to play and support the game because I want to see what it is capable of becoming, just be weary of what you're getting into if you're a new player.
Muito bom divertido de jogar sozinho divertido de jogar com amigos bom de todas as maneiras
Ебаное говнище разработчики хуй сосали и яйца облизывали

(2020)Высер полнейший.Каждый новый маньяк хуже предыдущего,а перки бесполезнее.Тебя всё также кидает на иные от тебя ранги.Баги?А то.Баланс?Не,не слышали.Нормальные сервера?А это кто...?Зато скины и главы с батлпасом регулярно завозим.Боже,даже с архивом проебались.А хитбоксы топоров Анны вообще другая тема.С её блять выхода решить проблему не могут.Короче игра класс и разрабы хорошие.Побольше бы таких)))
 

UPD (2022) Мы реворкнули перки так, чтобы эффективнее было играть без них. Мудрый ход.
